pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:5.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:5.2: Tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:5.3: “buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṃ paccācikkhāmi, saṃghaṃ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṃ paccācikkhāmi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:5.4: Kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro, santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:6.3: “kathañhi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:6.6: Kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro, santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī’”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:6.7: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:6.10: Kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro, santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī’”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:6.13: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:6.16: Kinnumāva samaṇiyo yā samaṇiyo sakyadhītaro, santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:6.17: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:6.18: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:7.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:7.2: ‘buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṃ paccācikkhāmi, saṃghaṃ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṃ paccācikkhāmi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:7.4: Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī’ti, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:7.6: buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṃ paccācikkhāmi, saṃghaṃ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṃ paccācikkhāmi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:7.8: Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmīti, abhiramāyye, svākkhāto dhammo;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:7.10: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:7.11: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsīyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyya iccetaṃ kusalaṃ;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:7.12: no ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṃghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:10.5: Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:12.1: Yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:12.6: Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:12.11: Sace paṭinissajjati iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce paṭinissajjati āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:12.18: Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:12.23: Sace paṭinissajjati iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce paṭinissajjati āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:13.2: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:13.3: ‘buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṃ paccācikkhāmi, saṃghaṃ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṃ paccācikkhāmi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:13.5: Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:13.7: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:14.2: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:14.6: Santaññāpi samaṇiyo lajjiniyo kukkuccikā sikkhākāmā, tāsāhaṃ santike brahmacariyaṃ carissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:14.8: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:14.9: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:16.1: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṃghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:16.2: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:17.4: Saṃghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjantiyā ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā paṭippassambhanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:19.2: yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya āpajjati, na saha vatthujjhācārā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:22.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:22.2: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:22.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
